
```py
>>> x = np.linspace(truncpareto.ppf(0.01, b, c),
...                 truncpareto.ppf(0.99, b, c), 100)
>>> ax.plot(x, truncpareto.pdf(x, b, c),
...        'r-', lw=5, alpha=0.6, label='truncpareto pdf') 
```

```py
>>> rv = truncpareto(b, c)
>>> ax.plot(x, rv.pdf(x), 'k-', lw=2, label='frozen pdf') 
```
